description: Azure Arc is a service offered by Microsoft that extends Azure management capabilities to on-premises, multi-cloud, and edge environments. It allows system administrators to manage servers, Kubernetes clusters, and other resources from a centralized Azure control plane, which can be particularly useful for organizations looking to maintain consistency across their infrastructures. Through Azure Arc, users can apply Azure services like governance and compliance to their resources, enabling a seamless experience regardless of where the resources reside. The integration of Azure Arc also facilitates the deployment of Azure services like Azure SQL and Azure App Services on local servers, enhancing flexibility and operational efficiency.
